#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int arr[50];
int main(void) {
	int t,n,i,count,max;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		count=1;
		max=1;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
			arr[i]=arr[i]-i;
		}
		sort(arr,arr+n);
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(arr[i-1]==arr[i])
			{	
				count++;
				if(count>max)
				max=count;
			}
			else
			count=1;
		}
		printf("%d\n",n-max);
	}
	return 0;
}
